name: Solar Explorer
description:
Fly around a far away solar system  in your cozy spaceship. 

Just try to ignore the fact that none of it makes any sence because i'm pretty sure the laws of physics wouldn't allow it. But other than that it's  pretty relaxing  watching your spaceship effortlessly fly across the solar system and cruise closely to planets.

this project was made in about 2 days as a side project because i was taking waayy to long on my winter game.

Controls:

W,A,S,D

Enjoy!
